description: This table contains refund transaction information from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account that has related transaction information.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number in the results of a query. Each refund transaction will have its own line number.

columns.name: RFND_TX_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the refund transaction associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: RFND_TX_UPDATE_DT
columns.description: The date of the last update of the refund transaction associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: REFUND_TX_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status of the refund transaction associated with the hospital account. i.e. 1-Posted 2-Exported 3-Comment Imported - Approved 4-Comment Imported - Rejected 5-Reversed


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Posted


Exported


Comment Imported - Approved


Comment Imported - Rejected


Reversed

columns.name: REFUND_AMOUNT_SENT
columns.description: The amount of the refund associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: REFUND_REF_NUMBER
columns.description: The reference number of the refund associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: REFUND_IP_COMMENT
columns.description: Import comment for the refund associated with the hospital account.
